forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 68F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 17C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 64F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
